nodes.text: The Making of Star Wars: Return of the Jedi
The Making of Star Wars: Return of the Jedi is a book by John Phillip Peecher detailing the making of Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi.

Mass Market Paperback: 288 pages
Publisher: Ballantine Books; Mti edition (August 12, 1983)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 034531235X
ISBN-13: 978-0345312358
